722721f-a.text:
Riverside Drive, north from West 85th Street, showing prominently a predecessor of the present (1937) Fifth Ave. busses. On the right is the Misses Ely's School for Young Ladies which was formerly the Episcopal Home of Mercy and occupying a setback position from the building line, between 85th and 86th Streets. North of same appears a row of brick homes,
from 85th to 87th Streets.
About 1905.
